caption.p: Intracellular and extracellular localization of Hsp70 in Huh7.5 cells. (A) The left panel shows staining of Hsp60 (cytoplasmic, mitochondrial protein) as a control for permeabilization and non-permeabilization staining conditions. The right panel shows the membrane and cytoplasmic staining of Hsp70. (B) 3-D confocal imaging of Hsp70 on the surface of unpermeablized Huh7.5 cells. Hsp70 = green. Cell nuclei = blue. Cell membrane = red.
